bug.short_desc: Randomly getting the old version/layout of editor tools

long_desc.thetext: I sometimes see the old version + layout of the editor tools, when I refresh the page it usually goes back to the new version + layout.
Can you give me an example URL? You're saying the new and old site appear on the same URL? I disabled most of the old editor tools already, so, I'm curious what URL you're seeing this on.
I think he means that he sometimes sees the remora pages for the editor tools, in their entirety, at random moments. I know most of us have been seeing them after the push, and it happens frequently.
it's every editor tools url afaict, but here is the most recent https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/editors/review/711783?num=39
Can you save the request/response headers of request where you get the old page?

Request URL:https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/editors/review/770959?num=1 Request Method:GET Status Code:200 OK
Request Headers Accept:application/xml,application/xhtml+xml,text/html;q=0.9,text/plain;q=0.8,image/png,*/*;q=0.5 Accept-Charset:ISO-8859-1,utf-8;q=0.7,*;q=0.3 Accept-Encoding:gzip,deflate,sdch Accept-Language:en-US,en;q=0.8 Connection:keep-alive Cookie:wtspl=741320; AMOv3=3nis94a9fkgo7n8iicentk1392; amo_home_promo_seen=5; sessionid=6c082956df8eb915470ab42cf7d6edcf; csrftoken=29739863c78b794b781d649b3564899a; WT_FPC=id=2f26eebb7b742e3992c1295417802045:lv=1302065272375:ss=1302063213778 Host:addons.mozilla.org Referer:https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/editors/queue/nominated User-Agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_7; en-US) AppleWebKit/534.16 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/10.0.648.204 Safari/534.16 Query String Parameters num:1
Response Headers Cache-Control:no-cache Connection:Keep-Alive Content-Encoding:gzip Content-Type:text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date:Wed, 06 Apr 2011 05:48:26 GMT Keep-Alive:timeout=5, max=1000 P3P:CP="NOI ADM DEV PSAi COM NAV OUR OTRo STP IND DEM" Server:Apache Transfer-Encoding:chunked Vary:Accept-Encoding Via:Moz-Cache-pp-zlb01 X-AMO-ServedBy:pm-app-amo27.mozilla.org X-Backend-Server:pm-app-amo27 X-Powered-By:PHP/5.2.9 X-amo-darklaunch:z
This should be fixed up. Thanks for the report and headers. That box is new and wasn't in the configuration pool.

I just got this on https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/editors/review/72598 and hit pm-app-amo12:
20:43:16.409[2260ms][total 6870ms] Status: 200[OK] GET https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/editors/review/72598 Load Flags[LOAD_DOCUMENT_URI LOAD_INITIAL_DOCUMENT_URI ] Content Size[-1] Mime Type[text/html] Request Headers: Host[addons.mozilla.org] User-Agent[Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110311 Firefox/4.0b13pre] Accept[text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8] Accept-Language[en-us,en;q=0.5] Accept-Encoding[gzip, deflate] Accept-Charset[ISO-8859-1,utf-8;q=0.7,*;q=0.7] Keep-Alive[115] DNT[1] Connection[keep-alive] Cookie[WT_FPC=id=x:lv=1x:ss=1x; __unam=x-4; dloadday=63.245x779868; SSID_AMO=xI; SSRT=xA; csrftoken=x8; __switchTo5x=x4; __qca=x0; wtspl=x8; AMOappName=firefox; sessionid=xf; amo_home_promo_seen=5; AMOv3=x0] Response Headers: Server[Apache] X-Backend-Server[pm-app-amo12] Vary[Accept-Encoding] Cache-Control[no-cache] Content-Type[text/html; charset=UTF-8] X-amo-darklaunch[z] Content-Encoding[gzip] P3P[CP="NOI ADM DEV PSAi COM NAV OUR OTRo STP IND DEM"] Date[Fri, 08 Apr 2011 03:43:17 GMT] Keep-Alive[timeout=5, max=995] X-AMO-ServedBy[pm-app-amo12.mozilla.org] Transfer-Encoding[chunked] Via[Moz-Cache-pp-zlb01] Connection[Keep-Alive] X-Powered-By[PHP/5.2.9]
This rewrite wasn't set up to look for app, just locale.
